name: teamimage
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool motorsportapi.
Tool description: MotorsportApi has live coverage for most popular motorsports including MotoGP, Nascar, World Rally Championship, Moto2, Moto3, Superbike and Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft (DTM). 
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
API description: Fetch the image in PNG format for a given team using the MMA RapidAPI.

is_id.description: The ID of the team for which the image is being retrieved.
